title: Owner of Private-Equity Firm Backed by Coors and Other Wealthy Families Is Accused of Misusing Funds
sub_head: The SEC has subpoenaed One Thousand & One Voices Management and a credit unit, documents show
body:
The Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating a private-equity firm backed by several ultrarich U.S. families after receiving complaints that its owner was using investor funds to cover personal expenses, documents show.
The firm, One Thousand & One Voices Management, and a unit that manages one of its funds received subpoenas three months ago from the SECâ€™s Division of Enforcement seeking a range of materials, according to documents viewed by The Wall Street Journal.
